summary: This test module collection evaluates the Writer AI component's core NLP capabilities, including enum‑based and literal‑type text classification, structured entity extraction, user information extraction, and sentiment analysis, using pytest fixtures and mock models to verify correct behavior across single‑label, multi‑label, and asynchronous scenarios.
business_intent: Validate that the Writer AI reliably performs essential text processing functions required for downstream business applications, ensuring accurate classification, extraction, and sentiment detection before deployment.
